website_summaries.verdict: Bring the low-top Sperry Seaside Perforated to your next spring and summer destination. The ultra-lightweight sneakers with breathable perforated details are meant for walking. While the snug fitting seems to be an essential component for the slip-on design, the leather material could be uncomfortable and cause rubbing at the back heel. To remedy this, wearers may opt to wear no-show socks at break-in or choose a size higher to get that comfortable walking experience from this budget-friendly summer kick.
pros: Majority of reviewers appreciated the slip-on design of the Sperry Seaside Perforated because it provided them with so much ease to wear making them as their on-the-go shoes
Some travelers considered buying these shoes as they are perfect for walking during hot summer days by the beach and a cool sneaker to wear while exploring tropical countries
Numerous users say these women’s slip-on is fabulous footwear for activities that involve a lot of walking like running errands or outdoor activities like strolling by the beach or window shopping
Several women find these low-top shoes trendy and fashionable that they go well with a lot of casual clothing during the spring and summer months
A large number of women preferred buying these shoes because it provided them with a massive selection of colorways to choose to suit their mood, fashion taste, and wardrobe preference
As it comes with perforations, some wearers considered buying them because of their breathability
The low-top perforated sneakers have a very soft and cushioning memory foam footbed, some wearers disclosed
While some say it has a snug fit, many wearers say it feels comfortable and molds to the feet after a few days of break-in because it stretches a bit to conform to the shape of the feet
cons: Several complaints were focused on how narrow the shoes are that some people with wide feet had to upsize by half up to full
Some users complained of getting blisters as the interior, and stiff material near the collar rubs through their ankles at first use because of the snug fitting
The narrow opening posed as a problem to some users that while they liked the slip-on design, they would have appreciated a broader collar for an easier entry

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes just arrived but they look worn ... did yours arrive this way as well?
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and non-slip. Good for travel
customer_reviews.text: I wanted comfortable shoes to travel in. We spent two weeks in Portugal and I wanted something that could make it on slick cobblestones, in castles and gardens but also be able to look presentable in hotels and restaurants in a whole day out from the hotel. These worked great, very comfortable yet stursy on wet cobblestones.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chauhan

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable despite being the same shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these same shoes in a different color from the Sperry website. Those shoes are very comfortable and I wear them all the time. These shoes have rough seams that rub the edges of my feet. I’ve tried wearing them a couple times to see if maybe they needed some breaking in, but unfortunately they are still unpleasant to wear. A pity as they are very cute.
customer_reviews.author: rockwren

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy'
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear at Disneyland and they were SO comfortable and long lasting! I didn't get a blister and my feet were comfy allll day long. Plus they're super cute to boot! Huge score, so glad I found them. I ordered a size 8 and found them to be true to size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Mom

customer_reviews.title: Hole within two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like the shoes. They are really comfortable. The problem is that within two weeks of wearing them occasionally (semi frequently) there is already a hole in the toe box of the right shoe. Perhaps Sperry should consider investing more in the manufacturing process.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: May want to size up, sneaker is so cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sneaker. BUT, Unfortunately, they run a bit small. I need to return them once I get the 7.5 I ordered just to ensure I choose the correct size. Hope that will work out. Looks beautiful, seems like a great slide sneaker, and the cushion is nice and seems comfortable. the gray is just what I wanted ... just a bit too small. So patiently waiting for my 2nd size. I almost always use a size 7 but these were just too perfect fitting on my foot. I need some wiggle room. Update: got the size 7.5 and it is perfect. Stay safe from the pandemic. The will be my last order for a while 😕
customer_reviews.author: Coffee_Sipper15

customer_reviews.title: I do like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I do like these shoes. I bought them for commuting. They are comfy and cool, but unfortunately not made well at all. I've only worn them a few weeks now and they are already falling apart at the seams. They are very cheaply glued. Don't waste your money :(
customer_reviews.author: StephAknee

customer_reviews.title: So Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could rate less than one star I would. I ordered a pair in my size and then saw other reviews that said the shoes are too small and order a full size larger- shoot. My correct size arrived and I couldn't begin to put them on. So, I returned them and ordered a full size larger. When they arrived, I still pulled them on and within 3o minutes felt rubbing and obvious sore spots that would result in blisters. These shoes were almost $70! I expected more from Sperry!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Breneman

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are so stylish and comfortable. I got them for a trip abroad and didn't have any difficulty wearing them in... cushy soles, however there is not a ton of arch support if that's what you're looking for. I wear them with nude no-show socks and they're perfect! Also ideal spring/ fall shoes to run after my little toddler in! I'm so happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Berglund

customer_reviews.title: A bit narrow, took a few days to break in
customer_reviews.text: These are great, but I did need two days to break them in (with socks). I wore them without socks for a few hours and was in pain. I have yet to try them without no show socks. I'll try again when I know I'm going to the beach where wetting them might help the process. Otherwise I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Good price for Sperry
customer_reviews.text: These are a good deal for sperry and are nice sneakers for summer. Very breathable. Sperry sizing can be confusing but these fit true to size for me.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Co. Seattle

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love them and I wear them everyday
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering these shoes. I absolutely love them and I wear them everyday. Perfect for spring and summer, have pretty decent support. I wore these to Universal Studios for 9 hours however and my feet were done for. I wouldn’t recommend them for a big day of walking
customer_reviews.author: Emily Rapp

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & comfy.
customer_reviews.text: These are SOOOO comfortable. Needed a little break-in period but are now all set. Bought them to wear during our trip to Europe rather than plain ol' sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous pair I purchased from Nordstrom's Rack...loved them then the dogs chewed them up so I found them from Amazon and ordered a pair. It was a little tight which I expected but I know it'll loosen up as I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: malee

customer_reviews.title: ... ran a little narrow so I would be more comfortable in a half size up
customer_reviews.text: I have a semi wide foot and didn't realize this ran a little narrow so I would be more comfortable in a half size up. It's a great, cute, and comfortable shoe nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: S. Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great style, but very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry that these shoes are so uncomfortable because they are really, really cute. They would have been very versatile and looked great with lots of different outfits. However, the side seam creates a large bump on the inside of the shoe that I know would rub a blister on my foot. The shoes are also extremely heavy. I would've expected Sperry brand shoes to be more feet friendly. Oh well :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Most painful shoes I’ve ever owned. I own two Sperry’s so I know that it’s necessary to break my new shoes in. However, this shoe design is flawed. There’s an extra flap of rubber/fabric inside the left shoe where it pushes into the side of my pinkie toe. I have a nasty bruise/numbness around the area after wearing it for few hours. The right shoe is less painful but after walking it starts to hurts too. If it didn’t hurt so much, these would be my to go shoes.
customer_reviews.author: iPhone1S

customer_reviews.title: They hurt my foot on the first wearing. Will ...
customer_reviews.text: They hurt my foot on the first wearing. Will have to wear thick socks (around the house) to stretch them out a little bit. The seams on the side of the shoes rubs on my foot, hoping that will change when I wear the thick socks. .
customer_reviews.author: kera cowan

customer_reviews.title: Cute casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: They are a slightly narrow but not uncomfortable. I have only worn them once so whether they will stretch out like previous reviews have mentioned is TBD. The in sole is super comfy and its a really cute shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Bee

customer_reviews.title: Love Sperry slip on sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to slip on sneaker. I have them in a few colors. I always get compliments on them. They go with everything, dresses, capris, jeans. Love the perforated style so they are breathable. I wish Sperry continued to carry them as a regular part of their offerings!
customer_reviews.author: GMJ

customer_reviews.title: Not a great quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Not a great quality shoe. When I initially received these as a gift I was going to return but then decided against it and was going to give them a shot. Within 48 hours the shoes already look like they are falling apart. Beside the quality of the shoe, they are very uncomfortable. My husband paid more for these than what is sold on the Sperry site :(
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P

customer_reviews.title: So narrow they hurt
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is way to tight.... I can’t walk in them without pain! I was so looking forward to wearing these.... I’m a 125 lbs 5’2 and a size 7 in all shoes so order a size up! So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Bernard

customer_reviews.title: I hated to return them but knew that I would have ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are narrow. I have never had a problem with narrow shoes before, but there was something in both shoes that rubbed against the side of my foot. I don't believe they would stretch to make it help. I hated to return them but knew that I would have problems every time I wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandma shoes (no offense, grandmas!)
customer_reviews.text: These would be super stylish for anyone middle aged and up; however, I just wasn't feeling them for myself. Super comfortable though! Perhaps I'll buy them again, if they continue to make them in 20 years!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tight at first but stretch out and feel great!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute but were tight and a bit uncomfortable on the sides/top at first. However, they have become super comfortable with wear.
customer_reviews.author: RJM

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love the rubber material, resists dirt better than most slip-ons. I'm VERY prone to getting blisters and I'm always afraid of trying new shoes and these have been great. No issues even from day 1. I think I bought a half size up as I always do with slides so they are easier to slide on an off.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Sizing not true to market
customer_reviews.text: I was sad to have to return it. I thought I'd save myself the hassle of running to the outlet but I should have at least tried on a similar Sperry before assuming they ran true to market size
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Narrow. It took a couple months of wearing a couple times a week to break these in.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: I am disappoint and will probably not wear them
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not light enough. I am disappoint and will probably not wear them often
customer_reviews.author: Elfin

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable. I wear these many times through out the week and they have held up. The liner in one of the shoes started to come a little loose and bunches up between my toes now and again. Other than that love them.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay Hindman

customer_reviews.title: Little to no tread
customer_reviews.text: There was little to no tread on these shoes. I am usually a sold size 8 and these were a bit tight. Seemed I would need to wear socks with them and that's not what I was looking for. Overall they are cute, but I wasn't impressed with the comfort. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, comfortable, and well made!
customer_reviews.text: Based on my experience with Sperry footwear, I took a chance on ordering these and I'm glad that I did! The shoes were a bit snug out of the box as others have indicated (I wear and ordered a 6.5), but within a very short period of time they stretched to perfection. They are adorable, comfortable, and in no way seem poorly made; quite the opposite, which is what I expect from Sperry. Thus, I'm now even more perplexed by the poor reviews. Although I've only had these a few days, I will be ordering other colors, unless something with them drastically changes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. I usually wear a size 7 in my other Sperrys but had to go up 1/2 size for these.
customer_reviews.author: iowa shopper

customer_reviews.title: Painful. Extremely Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fat, rough uncomfortable seem cuts into your feet and causes TERRIBLE pain.

customer_reviews.title: I got the light gray and absolutely love them. They are also extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear these all the time, with jeans, capris, shorts even summer dresses. I got the light gray and absolutely love them. They are also extremely comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Product was defective. I didn't realize it until it ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was defective. I didn't realize it until it was too late to return, so I had to keep them, but the shoes are unwearable.

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of these
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these, easy to get on and off, but unfortunately they gave me the worst blisters on my heels and now I don't want to wear them anymore. Any suggestions on how to prevent?

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them, even thught they were kind of tight at the beginning, probably because they were brand new.

customer_reviews.title: Shoe is made well Good quality and nice leather I am a size 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is made well Good quality and nice leather I am a size 7 and had to order 1/2 size down They run a bit large

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe but runs small.

customer_reviews.text: The product is great, but unfortunately it did not fit. Sperry does not offer a Wide product that I can tell. Too bad.

customer_reviews.title: They stretch with a lot of use

customer_reviews.text: The good news is they fit perfectly, provide good support and are comfortable. The bad news is that for a slip on they're very heavy.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great looking slip-ons!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Love These Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love These Shoes. I would buy more if I could still find them in my size!

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes and am thinking about getting them in ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and am thinking about getting them in other colors. They are so comfy, light, and super cute!!

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.title: Soft and confortable
customer_reviews.text: My wife love it, is the second pair we ordered, very confortable to work

customer_reviews.text: I have bought numerous pairs and the size is not totally consistent but love the shioe. That's why I do exchanges.

customer_reviews.title: but they stretch out a little to the perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Little tight the first and second time you wear them, but they stretch out a little to the perfect fit.

customer_reviews.text: Not for wide feet. Seams on top of pinky toe hurt.

customer_reviews.title: A fun sandal/flipflop alternative.
customer_reviews.text: A lot more comfy than I thought they would be. Need to break them in a little as the heel gave me a blister. I suggest wearing with peds for a little bit.

customer_reviews.text: Love he fit and the color. They go with everything.

customer_reviews.text: I surprised my daughter bc she was always a big fan of Sperry

customer_reviews.title: Narrow but love them
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shoe! They are pretty narrow but worth getting used too. They are super cute

customer_reviews.title: I love the look

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. Great alternative to sandals. Comfortable all day.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my purchase. Recommend these shoes to anyone looking for comfort and cute looking shoe

customer_reviews.title: Great all around shoe
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my shoes. I love the color and they're stylish. I put my orthotics in them, so that makes them fit well, and allows me to wear them for hours at a time. They;re not particularly supportive without my insert, but I'd buy them again cause of my inserts. I love wearing these stylish shoes in the warmer weather!
customer_reviews.author: Toby Caplin

customer_reviews.title: Narrow and runs small
customer_reviews.text: Order a size up! I ALWAYS wear a 5.5 and I have a narrow foot. I had to order a size up because the shoe is tight/narrow. Comfortable shoe when you wear no show socks.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Fedders

customer_reviews.title: These are also super comfy. They were tight at first
customer_reviews.text: These are also super comfy. They were tight at first, I have this weird bone bump on my foot and it irritated it at first it would leave an imprint as well, but as I wore them more and broke them in, they fit really well. It has loosened up a bit and are really comfy for walking in. Also, really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amz customer

customer_reviews.title: Love This Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes don't have much in the way of arch support but they are very comfortable and can be worn all day long. I just love the color which matches a lot more than you would think! Lot's of compliments too!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE HELP!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this show and would like to keep it but it arrived after I had left for my trip to Europe. It was on my front porch when I returned home. It is too small for me. I need a 1/2 size larger. Would you please allow me to exchange it for the correct size?
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but don’t wear well - cheap material on the upper
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but fall apart quickly. Too bad because I love them, but they look beat up right away. I bought Both blue and black and both faded quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow, not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just splurged on these but will end up returning them. They're very cute but don't work for me. I have a wide foot and these shoes are very narrow. I feel rubbing on the heels just walking around the house in them. Also, the leather feels more like suede so I imagine they will get dirty very quickly. Not worth the investment to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes - I can wear them walking all ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes - I can wear them walking all day without any problems. Took a couple of days to break in, but fine after that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my second pair and even though they are ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair and even though they are a bit snug, I know that they will stretch out a bit after wearing for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Deb076

customer_reviews.title: Cute...but didnt work:(
customer_reviews.text: Super cut shoe, but one shoe was larger then the other. I have other Sperrys and have never had this problem before. I'm sending them back and ordering them again from another website it hopes they fit right:/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, and cute but one shoe squeaks when I walk. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Liberty65

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Really liked these but the perforated leather is more suede like than leather. As we all know suede attracts dirt like crazy and I spend a lot of time in parks and in dirt with my kids. As much as I liked these I knew they would look dirty and ratty after one wear. They're great other than the texture of the leather and would be super comfortable during the spring/summer.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for all-day walking
customer_reviews.text: I usually get heel pain just from running errands on the weekends (even if I'm wearing athletic shoes). These are perfect for anyone who wants comfortable and stylish flats. I wore these all-day to a theme park without any pain - I didn't even have to break them in. LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: Justine C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love them so much. They are super comfy and they fit wonderfully. They came right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana montano

product_meta.title: Sperry Top-Sider Seaside Perforated Slip On Fashion Sneakers - Navy
product_meta.description: These Sperry Top-Sider Sneakers comes in Navy with Leather upper and 1.00 inch heel.
feature_bullets: Leather slip-on sneaker featuring perforated upper with elasticized goring at entry
